subject: Add NCW API Edge Function and database schema
body:
- Create ncw-api Edge Function handling all Fireblocks NCW endpoints
  (login, device assignment, RPC, accounts, assets, transactions)
- Add database migration for user_wallets and user_devices tables with RLS
- Update .env.example with Supabase Edge Functions URL pattern
- Document deployment steps in USER_ACTIONS.md
